description:
To carry out tree surgery including to reduce by 25% One Silver Birch (T2 on map). To reduce by 20% One Mature Oak (T3 on map)
To remove Two Oaks (T1 & T4 on map). All in A1 within TPO 395
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The trees are situated within the rear garden of 7 The Broadwalk, they can be seen from the Public
Right of Way in Ruislip Woods and surrounding properties. Collectively they have a moderate
amenity value and significantly contribute to the arboreal character of the Copse wood estate, an
Area of Special Local Character. Alongside other trees they create a transition of tree cover
between the Woods and the residential area.
Very limited information has been included in the application. With no reasons provided as to why
they wish to remove One Oak (T1) and reduce One Birch and One Oak (T2 and T3).
The work is unjustified and will have a negative impact on the amenity of the area.
The removal of deadwood, dangerous / hanging branches and ivy:  This does not require the formal consent of the Council.
